name: Street Warriors Online
description: First, realistic PvP brawling game for up to 8 vs 8 players with original, dynamic combat system and fast, round based battles. Create and develop Your character. Earn new skills and items that helps You beat Your opponents. Gather Your friends and fight together in a clan.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

reviews.review_text: Best menu music of any game of all time.

I,ll be honest about this game..   PRO's:  -Multiplayer ins not dead yet at this stage -Once you get paste the learning curve it is quite a fun game - Closest thing to a multiplayer brawler with up to a large amount of Players in a game brawling at once that feels like a old school doulbe dragon type game that exists at this stage  CONS -Very obvious that the game was made by a small team as is obvious B Grade quality -Graphics are and sound is out of date and B grade -Progressions seems slow But looking at the leader board seems currently it on goes to level 10 anyway. -element of pay to win (But luckly is not impossible to beat paying customers) -Can only have one character so you have to be really careful what class you choose at the begining  Being it is the only game like this I want to support it by posting a good review in the hopes that perhaps if Crazy Rocks Studios is successful enough they may actually be able to make this more like a triple A title or make a better seqeal in the future.   or even if a larger company sees Crazy Rocks's success and makes a game simular to this with better everything
This game reminds me of the good old days growing up in Volvograd, going to school fighting in the courtyard all the way to growing and having my own gang of hustlers in the suburbs
It's a very nice game with a lot of potential! Keep it up and don't fall into the void of P2W.

I love IT! Support your local Ultra Crews, But i think they must work on it . I need the real Hooligan Fight Emotions no singing no crying no Feeling Throw 2 items ? Where are te fireworks chairs Tabels much more ,and more ,and more .  So in moment you fight too other ppl in a small range but it feel like a simple fighting game .   But it has mass potential. Work on it and it will be great!
the animations are just really ugly and the gameplay gets so old so quick
Worst combat system ever.... this game is complete ♥♥♥♥
No. Played one bot game and it was artarded. couldnt get into matchamde game. zz  5/7
Why would a game like this not have a lock on.

Graphics and physics needs improvement. Allot of leavers and game queue times are very very long with people quiting all the time. Watch out for this if it gets better, but as all games. Where this game goes, its not going to improve.

This game isn't great at all in my opinion.. Took about 10 to 15 minutes to find a match and when you do its only like 5 minutes of gameplay. The graphics aren't that great and the controls are pretty weird if you play with a controller. I tried the tutorial but it was horrible..
After I choose my class the game freezes. Ive tried many times.
